description: At Dakine, they know that when the snow falls, the fun starts. That’s why they developed the Liftie Lite – a snow boot designed for those who call the mountains their playground. The ultralight shell and removable liner will keep your toes warm and dry when stomping around in the deep stuff, and the lightweight EVA midsole reduces heft for all-day comfort. They offer just the right mix of slopeside style and mountain tech for season-long play from that first dump through those springtime bluebirds.
name: Dakine Liftie Lite - Mens
